channel.title: Avenged Sevenfold Drummer/Backup singer "The Rev" dies at 28
channel.description:
Recently the drummer and backup singer of Avenged Sevenfold has died. This was my favorite band. If you do not like metal or are just going to troll, don't bother to post.
HUNTINGTON BEACH, Calif. (AP) -- Police say James Owen Sullivan, a drummer and backup vocalist for the Southern California band Avenged Sevenfold, has been found dead at his home in Southern California. Lt. John Domingo says the 28-year-old Sullivan, who went by the stage name The Rev, appears to have died of natural causes on Monday in Huntington Beach. The Orange County coroner's office is investigating the death. Avenged Sevenfold formed in Huntington Beach in 1999 and won Best New Artist at the MTV Video Music Awards in 2006. According to their MySpace page, the five-man metalcore band was working on their fifth album. The band released a statement Monday expressing their sadness and calling Sullivan "one of the world's best drummers," and "our best friend and brother."
[url=http://music.msn.com/music/article.aspx?news=449283>1=28102]http://music.msn.com/music/article.aspx?news=449283>1=28102[/url] @Those who will say that 'natural causes' is drugs, feel free to discuss it anyway. The reason is still being investigated. Other A7X fans and myself will always respect his art of drumming. The news devastated many people, and I will always remember The Rev. :(

item.title: Avenged Sevenfold Drummer/Backup singer "The Rev" dies at 28
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:8, topic:322874”][quote author=Spades link=topic=419277.msg3080684#msg3080684 date=1262130146]

Read about this earlier
They’re currently doing an autopsy, so don’t jump to the assumption that it’s drugs yet.

Just saying, look at how many Musicians have died in the past to Drugs…
[/quote]

You’re still assuming that the 100% reason he died is drugs, which is yet to be proven.[/quote]

I never said he did die because of drugs, you assume that I assume that he died from drugs, it can be anything, hell look at Brittany Murphy, died from a Heart Attack at age 32 not that long ago.

Read full topic
